\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{tikz}

\usepackage[psfixbb,graphics,tightpage,active]{preview}
\PreviewEnvironment{tikzpicture}
\usepackage[margin=0in]{geometry}
\begin{document}
\pagestyle{empty}
\begin{tikzpicture}[scale=1]
\node[](0)at(0,0.0)
{\scalebox{1}{0}};

\node[](1)at(0,1.6666666666666667)
{\scalebox{1}{1}};

\node[](2)at(0,3.3333333333333335)
{\scalebox{1}{2}};

\node[](3)at(0,5.0)
{\scalebox{1}{3}};

\draw(0.north)--(1.south);
\draw(1.north)--(2.south);
\draw(2.north)--(3.south);
\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
